titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 1424) to amend section 712 of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, section 2705 of the Public Health Service Act, section 9812 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require equity in the provision of mental health and substance-related disorder benefits under group health plans, to prohibit discrimination on the basis of genetic information with respect to health insurance and employment, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-907, by Ms. Slaughter.

Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to H.R. 1424: the Emergency Economic Stabilization Act of 2008; the Energy Improvement and Extension Act of 2008; and the Tax Extenders and Alternative Minimum Tax Relief Act of 2008. The resolution makes in order a motion by the Chairman of the Committee on Financial Services to concur in the Senate amendments. The resolution waives all points of order against consideration of the motion.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 287.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1525.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 235 - 190 (Roll no. 679).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 205 (Roll no. 680).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/2/2008--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 1424) to amend section 712 of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, section 2705 of the Public Health Service Act, section 9812 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require equity in the provision of mental health and substance-related disorder benefits under group health plans, to prohibit discrimination on the basis of genetic information with respect to health insurance and employment.
